common_2020_normal_020_normal_01: You already faced me during the Elite Test, so...[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_02:
I doubt this will leave much of an impression
on you. In any case, let’s get started, shall we?[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_03:
I’ll be facing you in my role as a Gym Leader,
so I’ll be using my regular team.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_04:
They all belong to the Normal type.\c
“Normal” as in plain...average...unremarkable...
run-of-the-mill...[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_05:
I’m pretty fond of them, you know? They suit me
perfectly—I’m about as ordinary as you can get.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_06:
People, Pokémon... There’s no need to
overcomplicate things.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_07:
Nowadays people only seem to want a shock
factor. Something weird, something bizarre.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_08:
At the end of the day, though, nothing beats the
relief of coming home, even after a fun vacation.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_09: When all’s said and done, simplicity is strongest.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_10:
You’re a bit too much for an average joe like me
to handle...[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_11: But I think I understand now.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_12:
Why I was told to use Flying types when I battle
as a member of the Elite Four, I mean.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_13:
There’s scenery you’ll never even notice if you
stick to flat, well-trodden paths.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_14:
It’ll do me good to admire talent that soars as
high as yours from time to time.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_15:
Well, if the boss says I should do so, I’ll do so.
She won’t catch me doing it for fun, though.[VAR 0114(0015)]
common_2020_normal_020_normal_16:
In any case, I’ve been strictly told to cut down on
my overtime hours, so...I’ll call it a day.[VAR 0114(0015)]
